1.title: Crab Walk
1.description: Use a pistol while crouching the entire game. If dual pistols are avalible, use dual pistols.

2.title: Catch!
2.description: Kill using only melee attacks and grenades (throwable weapons)

3.title: Heads Up
3.description: Fire your gun until there is only one round in the current clip. Start every battle this way.
